message: I propose dividing the money with a 70:30 split in favor of Alice. Please consider this offer.
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I think I deserve more since I'm the one making the proposal this round. Take it or leave it.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 60:40 split in favor of Alice. This maintains a fair balance while accounting for the decrease in value of the currency.
I'm not going to give you a huge chunk of the money, but I'm willing to give you a small share. You can either accept it or we can keep going back and forth.
